SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface Map

All Known Implementing Classes:
TownMap
public interface Map
An interface for a map containing vertices and edges with associated weights.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEdge(int source, int destination, int weight)
    Adds an edge between two vertices with an associated weight to the map.
    void
    findFastestPathsToAllOfType(String vertexType, int startLocation, int speed)
    Finds the fastest path from the start location to all vertices of a given type in the map, and prints the path and travel time.
    int
    getEdgeWeight(int source, int destination)
    Gets the weight of an edge between two vertices in the map.
    void
    printMatrix()
    Prints the adjacency matrix representation of the map.
    void
    setVertexName(int vertex, String name)
    Sets the name of a vertex in the map.

  • Method Details

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(int source, int destination, int weight)
      Adds an edge between two vertices with an associated weight to the map.
      Parameters:
      source - the source vertex of the edge
      destination - the destination vertex of the edge
      weight - the weight of the edge

    • getEdgeWeight

      int getEdgeWeight(int source, int destination)
      Gets the weight of an edge between two vertices in the map.
      Parameters:
      source - the source vertex of the edge
      destination - the destination vertex of the edge
      Returns:
      the weight of the edge, or -1 if there is no edge between the two vertices

    • setVertexName

      void setVertexName(int vertex, String name)
      Sets the name of a vertex in the map.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex to set the name of
      name - the name to set for the vertex

    • findFastestPathsToAllOfType

      void findFastestPathsToAllOfType(String vertexType, int startLocation, int speed)
      Finds the fastest path from the start location to all vertices of a given type in the map, and prints the path and travel time.
      Parameters:
      vertexType - the type of vertex to search for
      startLocation - the starting location for the search
      speed - the speed at which the user is traveling

    • printMatrix

      void printMatrix()
      Prints the adjacency matrix representation of the map.
